question: Where can I find a text tutorial from CÉCI?
answer: A text tutorial from CÉCI, Belgium is available at http://www.ceci-hpc.be/slurm_tutorial.html.

question: Is there a minimal text tutorial from Bright Computing available?
answer: Yes, a rather minimal text tutorial from Bright Computing is available at http://www.brightcomputing.com/blog/bid/174099/slurm-101-basic-slurm-usage-for-linux-clusters.
